title: ellAm umadu
sahitya:
ellAm umadu sheyal enrAl enmEl pazhi EduNDu sholluvIrayyA


anupallavi

  kallAla marattin kIzh shollAmal shollum nIr allAmal OraNuvum amaiyAda tuNmaiyanrO


caraNam    pAvaiyadanaip-pOl pAril nAnADuginrEnE pAva puNNiyamellAm paNNa nAn vallanO 
kOvaiyidazh muruval konjum paramEshvari kuzhandE kaLikkat-tillai kUttADum nAyakarE
